episodes.title: Cults often rebrand: Amanda Montell on tactics of high-control groups | Horror in the Heartland
episodes.description:
"Horror in the Heartland" host Hena Doba sits down with Amanda Montell, a best-selling author and podcast host, for a compelling deep dive into the world of cults, the 2x2 Church and the psychological impact of being a part of high-controlled groups. Montell draws on her extensive knowledge to discuss the subtle but powerful use of community and language to manipulate everyday people to join these dangerous organizations, and the strength it takes to leave them.

To watch episode four: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-3QLZfjHMPQ
To watch episode five: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZRDRItaR-0c

#2x2sect #cult #truecrime

episodes.title: Historian reveals when secret religion 'Two by Twos' was actually founded | Horror in the Heartland
episodes.description: Historian Cherie Kropp has spent her entire life observing and eventually documenting everything she could about the 2x2 sect, a religion found in the heart of America that has managed to stay under the radar. Cherie reveals when and how the religious group was founded, a truth that followers were not told. As a former member herself, she tells host Hena Doba her unique insight into what it was like to be brought up on convention grounds, a place where followers from all over would join together to practice their religion. Episode one: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B6Dg54Haw9g&list=PL6PrA6lo8rJIVCCL1bJgDqiAOlzezkBXj Episode two: https://youtu.be/8j7Ry5aKaqQ?si=MP6uzIKJW5xhgcc2 Episode three: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZlP2-d9jljQ&list=PL6PrA6lo8rJIVCCL1bJgDqiAOlzezkBXj&index=3 Episode four: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-3QLZfjHMPQ&list=PL6PrA6lo8rJIVCCL1bJgDqiAOlzezkBXj #truecrime #2x2sect #cult CREDITS Host: Hena Doba Executive Producer: Kayla Jardine Senior Producer: April Gambardella Booker: Alexis Howell Editor: Rita Cripe "Horror in the Heartland" is NewsNation`s chilling, new digital series hosted by anchor Hena Doba, where the quiet streets of Middle America become the backdrop for the nation`s most shocking crimes. episodes.title: 'I'm so angry': Private investigator looking into 2x2 abuse claims | Horror in the Heartland
episodes.description: Private investigator Cynthia Liles has been looking into the religious organization known as the "Two by Twos" for years. She speaks with "Horror in the Heartland" host Hena Doba about the widespread abuse she says she's uncovered after spending years investigating the church and shares what she knows about the ongoing FBI investigation. episodes.title: Former 'Two by Twos' members speak out on widespread abuse | Horror in the Heartland
episodes.description:
Hena Doba speaks with Abbi and Mike Prussack, a married couple who met in the "Two by Twos" sect before deciding to leave together. Once out of the religious group, they decided to create resources for former members to transition back into society and for abuse victims to share their stories.

episodes.title: Former 2x2 worker says he warned church about child abuse and was ignored | Horror in the Heartland
episodes.description: Former "Two by Twos" worker Andy Scholl didn't leave the religion until he was in his 50s, but he says he wishes he spoke up against his former church sooner. In an interview with Hena Doba, Scholl details the abuses he saw firsthand and how he says leadership refused to take action after allegations of child abuse surfaced.To read the letter from church leaders following Dean Bruer's death, you can view it here: https://www.tellingthetruth.info/phot... episodes.title: ‘I Was His Target’: Former 2x2 member's shocking abuse claims | Horror in the Heartland
episodes.description: Former 2x2 church member Sheri Autrey says she was just 14 when a 28-year-old church worker moved into her family’s home and began abusing her. In this exclusive interview with Hena Doba, Autrey shares never-before-released audio recordings she says prove what happened. NewsNation reached out to the accused, but has not heard back at the time of publication."Horror in the Heartland" is NewsNation’s chilling, new digital series hosted by anchor Hena Doba, where the quiet streets of Middle America become the backdrop for the nation’s most shocking crimes.
